overview:
With over 20 years experience in Marketing and Web based businesses, Dean has an impressive record of bringing ideas to life.

Dean assists businesses in the online space that are either transitioning from a start up to a real business or established companies who require assistance strategically be it to sell the companies vision to public markets, raise capital or work on business development opportunities.

In 2004 Dean started a company called ‘Ansearch’ that would eventually list on the Australian stock exchange (November 2005). He was CEO of Ansearch Limited till June 2007.

Following Ansearch he invested in and became CEO of Exit Reality, a web tool that enables the conversion of all websites into immersive, 3D environments. He was CEO until the lead up to the formal launch of Exitreality, August 2008.

Since 2008 Dean has focused his efforts on developing and bringing to market his own ideas.

Many of Deanâ€™s projects are listed on his website in the Take A Chance section. Visit http://www.whodeani.com for more information.
